alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 3:13PM EDT until August 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 212 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hiland Park, or over Lynn Haven, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Brannonville and Millville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
